rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Alas! Alack! 'Tis you noble folk,
is it not? Our brave and gallant kin who
have taken up arms against the Holy Grail!

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0002
rows.name: I am but a humble traveling bard...

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I boast no skill at arms, but I yearn to
immortalize the bold deeds of others,
that they may inspire and edify forever.

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Would you kind lords and ladies care to
share stories of your conquests with
your humble servant?

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0201
rows.name:
Ah, hardship and discord... overcome
through joint effort... and of course,
the bond 'twixt Driver and Blade...

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0202
rows.name:
These are the underpinnings of many
a great tale, the likes of which your one
is certain to one day be!

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0203
rows.name:
Thank you! I feel I have learned
a great deal, and I long to learn
a great deal more still.

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0204
rows.name:
I hope you'll speak with me again,
my lords, my ladies, should you have
more you'd like to leave to posterity!

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0301
rows.name:
Oh, truly?
That is regrettable, to say the least.

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0302
rows.name:
I feel strongly your tales would strongly
resonate with the hearts of many, both
in this age, and in those yet to come...

rows.label: tlk70000158_01_msg0303
rows.name:
I remain here, my lords, my ladies.
Should you reconsider, I will be waiting
for your tales eagerly.
